entry.em: ..COLD WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING

entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY AND COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 5 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 9 BELOW

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 18
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH IN THE MORNING
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 8 BELOW IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 2 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE MORNING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 12
CALM WINDS

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
